mixed-citation.article-title: First records and two new species of sipunculans (Sipuncula) from the Southern Mexican Pacific

tp:treatment-sec.p: as Phascolosoma agassizii ; type locality: Mendocino, California. — Steinbeck & Ricketts 1941: 345–346 (under boulders, intertidal, Point Lobos, Espíritu Santo Island, Baja California Sur ). — Brusca & Thompson 1977: 44, as P. agassizii (Cabo Pulmo reef, Baja California Sur , Mexico , in coral). — Brusca 1980: 126, as P. agassizii (Gulf of California, Mexico ). — Dean et al. 2010: 62, as P. agassizii (Point Ulloa, Costa Rica , in calcareous rock).
